data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Yusuke Araki awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Urawa.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu drive upfield and Carlinhos Junior gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Urawa defender.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Urawa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kenta Nishizawa for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 8, Urawa to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Urawa are coming forward and Kenyu Sugimoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 12, Yusuke Araki awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, In Saitama Shimizu attack through Yusuke Goto. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Important block from the Urawa defence as Renato Augusto fires in a strike for Shimizu.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 19, In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Elsinho (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 21, Takuya Aoki (Urawa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Thomas Deng is booked for the home team.
In the minute 25, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Shimizu are caught offside.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Urawa, close to Shimizu's area.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 33, Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Saitama.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shimizu throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 39, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick Shimizu.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Saitama.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Kai Shibato is replacing Takuya Aoki for the home team.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Urawa.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 50, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Urawa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a Shimizu throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Leonardo is on target to give Urawa a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 56, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 58, Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Urawa.
Shimizu push forward at Saitama Stadium 2002 and Elsinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Urawa defence.
Urawa's Koya Yuruki breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
The away team have replaced Yusuke Goto with Keita Nakamura. This is the first substitution made today by Peter Cklamovski.
In the minute 63, Teerasil Dangda is on a sub for Shota Kaneko for Shimizu.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's second substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Takuya Ogiwara replacing Koya Yuruki.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Free kick Urawa.
In Saitama, Ryosuke Yamanaka of Urawa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Urawa's Leonardo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
In the minute 75, Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Saitama.
Urawa's Takuya Ogiwara is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
In the minute 78, In Saitama Urawa drive forward through Kenyu Sugimoto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Urawa are pushing forward but Takuya Ogiwara's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 79, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Takuya Ogiwara for Urawa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Yusuke Araki awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a third substitution, with Kosuke Taketomi replacing Takahiro Sekine.
Urawa's Ryosuke Yamanaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Shimizu make their third substitution with Yuito Suzuki replacing Renato Augusto.
Riyo Kawamoto is replacing Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Goal! Shimizu draw level to 1-1 through a Valdo header.
In the minute 86, Keita Nakamura instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Leonardo (Urawa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Saitama Stadium 2002, Urawa are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
